params._index: The index of the bit we want to extract
params._intVal: The uint256 we are extracting a bit out of

returns._0: The bit (1 or 0) in a uint8

getNthBitFromRight(uint256,uint256).notice: get the n'th bit in a uint.         For instance, if exampleUint=binary(11), getNth(exampleUint, 0) == 1, getNth(2, 1) == 1
